data.message: I was there last  july to give a hand with canadian Red Cross and I know how courageous great people the nepalese are...they gave me so much more than what I did...they gave me a life lesson...and made me part of the world !  Thank you for the money you gave but also thank you FB to keep people in touch ...

replies.message: It's truly amazing what we can learn by immersing ourselves in our community, Line. Thanks for sharing and for being part of our community! -Rey
